titleStmt.title: Abrahams tryall a sermon preached at the Spittle, in Easter weeke. Anno Domini 1602. By George Downame Doctor of Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Downame, George, d. 1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field and F. Kingston] for Humfrey Lownes,
